title: Hamed Shirkanlou
text:
Hamed Shirkhanlou is an Iranian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who last played for <a href="Mes%20Sarcheshmeh%20F.C.">Mes Sarcheshmeh</a> of the <a href="Iran%20Pro%20League">IPL</a>.
Career.
Shirkhanlou played a season for <a href="F.C.%20Aboomoslem">Aboomoslem</a> in 2004. Since 2008, he has been playing for <a href="Mes%20Sarcheshmeh%20F.C.">Mes Sarcheshmeh</a>.
